com.ctrlaltelite.pos.database

Class OrderDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ctrlaltelite.pos.database.OrderDAO

  • public class OrderDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Order entities in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • createOrder

        public static int createOrder(Order order)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates a new Order in the database along with its associated OrderItems and OrderComboItems.
        Parameters:
        order - the Order object to be created
        Returns:
        the generated order ID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • getOrderById

        public static Order getOrderById(int orderId)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves an Order from the database based on its unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the unique identifier of the Order to retrieve
        Returns:
        the Order object if found; otherwise, null
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • getAllOrders

        public static java.util.List<Order> getAllOrders()
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all Orders from the database.
        Returns:
        a list of all Order objects
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      • deleteOrder

        public static void deleteOrder(int orderId)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Deletes an Order from the database based on its unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        orderId - the unique identifier of the Order to delete
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs
